pages.text: $(l)(Active-Offensive)/$$(br)Frag Bombs target a single tile and deal 1 damage to it. If that tile contains a ship, then up to 8 surrounding tiles are also damaged. Each Frag Bomb has one stat: Fragments. It determines how many extra tiles are damaged if the ability hit a ship. $(l)Fragments can't be blocked./$

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)If the frag bomb hits an $(l:abilities/passive/energy_shield)$(thing)Energy Shield/$, the ability is nullified. However, if fragments from the frag bomb hit an Energy Shield after the initial ability hit a ship, those fragments will ignore the shield! (The shield won't be damaged by them either)
